page.title: 19GATTONSIDE MAINS FARM
page.content: {"Why did you choose to be a farmer?" "I grew up on a farm and always wanted to be a farmer" {"How many workers do you have?" "3 full time workers and 1 part time" {"How many hours do you work per day?" "9-11 hours a day" {"How many cattle have you got?" "805 cattle" {"How much grass is grown?" "15-30 acres of grass per field" {"Why is grass grown?" "Grass is needed to feed the cattle" {"What is the job you like doing most {on the farm?" } "Working with cattle" {"Why do you prefer farm life to town {life?" "I enjoy the freedom and fresh air of country life"
